title: The Power of Mindful Eating: Transform Your Relationship with Food
author: Graziella De Souza
excerpt: Learn how mindful eating can revolutionize your wellness journey and help you create a sustainable, joyful relationship with food.

content.value: Mindful eating isn't just about what you eat—it's about how you eat. This simple practice can transform your entire wellness journey.

Mindful eating means paying full attention to the experience of eating. It's about noticing the colors, smells, textures, and flavors of your food. It's about eating without distraction and truly savoring each bite.

1. Eliminate distractions - Turn off the TV, put away your phone
2. Take three deep breaths before eating
3. Notice the appearance and aroma of your food
4. Chew slowly - aim for 20-30 chews per bite
5. Put your fork down between bites
These practices are covered in detail in our 30-day Foundation phase. Ready to dive deeper? Join us in the app!
